name: Connecting your daily work to intent & vision with Arnaud Porterie, founder of EchoesHQ (Ship It! #24)
summary: This week Gerhard is talking with Arnaud Porterie, founder of EchoesHQ, a new utility that measures and communicates engineering activity. They start by re-creating the 60 seconds Y Combinator pitch, and then shift focus to what it was like to get EchoesHQ off the ground. Next, they tackle something which is always on ...
